languages.text: "Ты принимаешь дурманы, чтобы слышать шепоты, и истязаешь плоть, получая извращенное удовольствие. Признайся, твоя аскеза — фальшивка!"
"First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"
languages.original_text: "Ты принимаешь дурманы, чтобы слышать шепоты, и истязаешь плоть, получая извращенное удовольствие. Признайся, твоя аскеза — фальшивка!"

traits.locale_text: "You take stimulants to hear whispers, and you torture yourself because you take perverted pleasure in doing so. Admit it, your vaunted ascesis is just a facade!"

languages.text: "Erst nehmt Ihr Stimulanzien, um flüsternde Stimmen zu hören, dann foltert Ihr Euch wegen des perversen Vergnügens, das Ihr dabei empfindet. Gebt es zu: Eure so vielgepriesene Selbstverleugnung ist nur eine Fassade!"
languages.original_text: "First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"

traits.locale_text: "Erst nehmt Ihr Stimulanzien, um flüsternde Stimmen zu hören, dann foltert Ihr Euch wegen des perversen Vergnügens, das Ihr dabei empfindet. Gebt es zu: Eure so vielgepriesene Selbstverleugnung ist nur eine Fassade!"

languages.text: « D'abord, vous prenez des stimulants pour percevoir de soi-disant murmures, et ensuite, vous vous infligez d'indicibles tourments pour le seul plaisir pervers que cela vous procure... Avouez-le, votre sacro-sainte abnégation n'est guère plus qu'une façade ! »
languages.original_text: "First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"

traits.locale_text: « D'abord, vous prenez des stimulants pour percevoir de soi-disant murmures, et ensuite, vous vous infligez d'indicibles tourments pour le seul plaisir pervers que cela vous procure... Avouez-le, votre sacro-sainte abnégation n'est guère plus qu'une façade ! »

languages.text: «Primero toma estimulantes para escuchar susurros y luego se tortura por el perverso placer que recibe. Admítalo, ¡su cacareada abnegación es una farsa!».
languages.original_text: "First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"

traits.locale_text: «Primero toma estimulantes para escuchar susurros y luego se tortura por el perverso placer que recibe. Admítalo, ¡su cacareada abnegación es una farsa!».

languages.text: 「わなたは囁きを聞くために覚せい剤を服用し、次に、それが与えてくれる倒錯した快楽のために自分を苦しめる。認めて。見栄を張ってもそれは見せかけに過ぎないわ！」
languages.original_text: "First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"

traits.locale_text: 「わなたは囁きを聞くために覚せい剤を服用し、次に、それが与えてくれる倒錯した快楽のために自分を苦しめる。認めて。見栄を張ってもそれは見せかけに過ぎないわ！」

languages.text: “你先是为了听到低语声而服用兴奋剂，接下来又为了变态的快感而折磨自己。承认了吧，你自吹自擂的自我克制，不过是假象罢了！”
languages.original_text: "First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"

traits.locale_text: “你先是为了听到低语声而服用兴奋剂，接下来又为了变态的快感而折磨自己。承认了吧，你自吹自擂的自我克制，不过是假象罢了！”

languages.original_text: "First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"

languages.text: "Önce fısıltıları duymak için uyarıcı alıyorsun, sonra da sana verdiği o sapkın zevk için kendine işkence ediyorsun. Kabul et işte. Yere göğe sığdıramadığın o özverin, yalan dolandan ibaret!"
languages.original_text: "First you take stimulants to hear whispers, then you torture yourself for the perverted pleasure it gives you. Admit it: your vaunted self-denial is nothing but a facade!"
